website_summaries.verdict: A good quality cooker that is shielded to protect its sensitive electronics.
pros: Shielded to keep steam from damaging electronics
Heats to 194 degrees F. Very quiet
Instructions are clear, easy to follow
Comes with a soft storage sleeve
cons: Timer is a little cumbersome to use
Some reports that this cooker has trouble maintaining temperature

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! Uncontactable Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once. It did not heat to the temperature shown, the time/temp wheel didn't work properly, and the fahrenheit temp didn't work at all. All my meat was ruined the first time I used it because the water never got hot enough. I decided to try it a second time just to be sure I wasn't doing something wrong. Had the same problems, so I returned it. Found out these were all common complaints on this product. Seller does not provide any way to contact them. Even Amazon rep could find any way contact them to help resolve the problems.
customer_reviews.author: bdb

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative to Anova
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit for sous vide cooking. I have thewhich works great and I recommend that one. However if you are looking for a cheaper priced machine that does pretty much the same thing, go for the Gramercy. Has same features as the Anova: temp set and timers. The only difference is Anova has the phone app. Not sure about the Gramercy. Save money and get the Gramercy and start sous vide-ing EVERYTHING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chao ChaoTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: No support if you have issues
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 1 star because the unit did not work upon arrival. Typically that would’ve such an issue as you can contact the manufacturer to trouble shoot any issues but I could not find ANYTHING to contact the manufacturer. Extremely frustrating and took me a long to confirm it was actually “broken” vs just a user error.
customer_reviews.author: J Trent

customer_reviews.title: Temp control non functional.  Need precision with sous vide.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save money with this unit. It did not work to control temperature. Read and followed all instructions and temperature kept climbing to over 30 degrees F above set temperature. Highly disappointed and ruined planned night and 30 dollars of steak. I tried giving it time and regulating the water including setting the temp really low but it kept heating and heating. Spend the money for a good unit and avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thaddeus L.

customer_reviews.title: It's great, utill it fails.
customer_reviews.text: While sous vide is an amazing and convenient way to cook, this particular product was practically useless after three months. At this point 90% of the time I turn it on it goes "beep, beep, beeeeeeeep." And refuses to turn on. It was difficult to find any sort or guide as to what the various beeps meant, and the closest thing to what I had was 'not enough water, which the water was near 'max'. The closest suggestion is that I have steam inside and to put it in rice for a day, yet I haven't even used it in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Did not work after approxinaly 2 seconds, but they sent me a new one for free!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and it turned on, it turned off 2 seconds later and I was unable to get it back on. I tried several outlets and followed all directions but did not work. I returned the item, thankfully I was still within the time frame to do so. If I had waited a week to try it out I would have been out of the $80 with a useless stick. Edit: They did mail me a new Sous Vide and after using it for a month it works great. Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: James O'Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Temperature not correct
customer_reviews.text: I just made eggs at 148 for 50 minutes and they looked like 130 eggs. I checked the temp with my instant read and it read 132. No wonder I have been having difficulty. Update: The company refunded my cost and gave me instructions to adjust the temp. We will see if it holds. I have not retested this yet, but the company won't stop emailing me. Please stop.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Worked once... didnt maintain temp then, now it wont even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: MaX RaY

customer_reviews.title: Unit died!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked. A dozen times and then the display turns red and beeps regardless of the what temp the water is. I changed the water temperature several times and no change. I will look for a different one. They couldn't give a s_ _ _. Really!!!!
customer_reviews.author: victor kowalski

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these that I purchased and broke within three months. Light use too. Cheap price. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I have problems cooking to the pro
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a week and used it 3 times. It works great. I have problems cooking to the pro. per temp for my steaks. My grill has hot spots so even using a thermometer internal steak temp varies. This Gramercy works great. Cooked a filet....perfect 135 degrees. Seared it with a propane torch. It was the best steak that I have ever made. My friends and family call me the steak master. I continued to cook other filets and a sirloin with the same results. Next, I am going to cook hamburgers, not the frozen boxed ones. I highly recommend this Gramercy. I went on youtube to watch sousvideverything.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the product a total of six times and it now, no longer turns on. Will stick to anova from now on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Directions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of "fix it and forget it" meals that I normally make in a slow cooker. Was so excited when my immersion cooker arrived. I ordered some reusable silicone bags as well. Much easier to store than a slow cooker. Directions were easy to follow. Unit itself is well made. I've only used it once, but the meat I cooked seemed much more flavorful then when I use the slow cooker - assuming because it's more contained in the bag when it's cooking. Was very easy to set and use while getting my house cleaned and viola, dinner was done. I can see this becoming one of my favorite kitchen gadgets!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly May

customer_reviews.title: Intriguing kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: This Immersion cooker is a very nice cooking appliance. It takes up very little space to store, it is very easy to clean, and throws out very little heat on a hot day in your kitchen. I have cooked eggs in it to make an omelette, And I also cooked chicken, both of which we enjoyed. I was disappointed that there was not more instruction as to how to use the machine, but did find some help online as well as recipes. By trial and error I been figuring it out and am very intrigued with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mayjar

customer_reviews.title: Sous Vide Cooking is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that sous vide cooking was easy and that the food tastes great. I'm very happy to say that my Gramercy Kitchen Co Sous Vide Immersion Circulator Cooker makes that statement a true one! The cooker is very easy to use and the food it makes tastes great. The support of the company is great too, as I lost my manual and sent an email to their support email and within minutes I received a reply with a link to download the manual. Wow! If you want to have an easy way to make great food, you have to get one of these Gramercy Kitchen sous vide cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carr

customer_reviews.title: Temp not accurate but otherwise a decent unit [UPDATED]
customer_reviews.text: Temperature is consistently 6F lower than what the machine reads out. I just adjust based on that. Otherwise, works pretty well. Build quality is solid. Performance is as I'd expect (minus the thermometer mis-read). [Update] Gramercy generously refunded half of my purchase price do to the temp issue. I did not reach out to them. They noticed my review and proceeded to refund and tell me how to re-calibrate the unit. Really impressed with the customer service from Gramercy.
customer_reviews.author: GeronimoJenkins

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction cuts power —>> Spoiled food
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first ~month. After that the device would shut down at random times, typically during the middle of a cook, beeping endlessly until unplugged from it’s wall socket. Same problem arises after plugging back in, but happens much sooner. When I’m not around to notice the shutdown beeping noise, the food inevitably gets cold and thus spoils. Completely disappointed. EDIT: Company reached out and sent a new one at no cost. It’s been working fine thus far. They made an honorable move so I will return the favor by updating my rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jemima

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED Product Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Sous Vide circulator last year and wanted to update others who are considering this purchase. I really liked this unit because it did not require an app on your mobile device to run it. It functioned very well for a few months but later started to go into shut down mode (fail) after it was fully warmed up. I contacted Gramercy Kitchen customer support and they walked me thru the process of replacing the unit. We got a replacement at no cost and the new one even has a new feature to allow it to automatically start cooking later in the day. Great product and great support.
customer_reviews.author: Metro Man

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Ever
customer_reviews.text: This worked right out of the box just as stated, and worked excellently. My internet connection can be a prima donna at times so I wanted something that I could just plug in, set and go This is it. Looking forward to many healthier meals, I did steak and the texture was unbelievable.And the customer service is the best I have ever seen. I requested some information about this product that I lost and they were right on it and even went the extra mile and sent it twice. Very pleased and happy with this product. On wish there were more options on the site to cook, mostly Thai and chicken thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Glorybelle

customer_reviews.title: where is the manual?
customer_reviews.text: this device came with NO manual. I'm trying to get the cooker set at 185 degrees F. but it only goes to 100. Surely there is a logical explanation but how am I suppose to know how to set it WITHOUT a MANUAL!?! After going to Gramercy website I was able to send them an email and they replied promptly with a pdf link to the manual. The cooker is set to Celsius by default and after reading the manual I was able to toggle to Fahrenheit. Problem solved. Still it would of saved me time & frustration ad the manual been provided with the cooker.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Worked well the first time. Now cooks steak only ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first time. Now cooks steak only to medium rare, I have increased cooking time from 1 1/2 to 2 then 3 hours, I then increased temp by 10 degrees - all to no avail. I can't figure out if I'm doing something wrong or if I got a "clunker.". I bought and used the food vacuum sealer... I didn't get anything other than the instructions on how to plug it in, turn it on etc so maybe there's a "trick" I'm missing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. The only improvement I would suggest is to make the part that "clips" to the water pan a permanent part of the unit and design it with a large clip (similar to the one made by Gourma) for a quicker hook up and removal. I owned a Gourma and so far I like the one made by Gramercy much better. The touch panel on this one is much more responsive and the dials are larger and easier to read. I hope it last longer than the one made by Gourma which failed after a little over a year, obviously out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Fred B Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't heat above about 140F
customer_reviews.text: The unit was incapable of heating above about 140 degrees. I had to turn the stove on to add more heat to get the temp to the set point. The unit states a 15qt max volume, I was nowhere near that limit. I had no more than 4qt of water when I tried it. It's being returned. Update: we're getting weekly emails from GRAMERCY KITCHEN CO. requesting feedback about the unit. This is a nice attempt but we returned the defective sous vide cooker over a month ago and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing! This sous vide heater is rock solid and ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing! This sous vide heater is rock solid and extremely user friendly. My first use of it was to make poached eggs and prime ribeye steaks. Both turned out amazing, but the steaks were unbelievable! The owner of Gramercy Kitchen reached out to me with a courtesy follow up email to ensure the order went through and that there are no issues with the product. He also provides helpful hints and links to cooking guides. If you're looking around for a sous vide device, stop looking and go with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It was way easier to use than I was anticipating! Within minutes I had the temp and time set and ready to go, and it did NOT have to be connected via Bluetooth. I had read reviews for other brands and it seemed like it would be too time consuming and a bother to have to go through WiFi/Bluetooth just to heat water. So thankful Gramercy is just two options temp and timer, and the dial is quick to use. My first attempt at sous vide burgers...my family told me we will not be able to go back to the old way of preparing, since these turned out perfect; juicy and so tasty. Clean up was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: The amazing product really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The amazing product really easy to use. I always wanted to cook food at a correct temperature and this is just the right product. Simple instructions and easy to use. It was also super quiet. I love that I could set it and leave it alone to cook. You don't need to constantly watch the especially the meat dishes. If you want something to be cooked with precision this is your product.
customer_reviews.author: timila

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING Product, Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Being a seasoned chef, I know how to grill a steak that comes out really good. But this little guy takes all the guess work out of the process and it does exactly what it needs to do. A couple of premium cut NY strips were the first victims in the not-quite-boiling bath and they were very nice. The great benefit of this product is to get it cooked and held to the point that allows you to multi task in the kitchen. I will tell you that it does help you be more efficient with your cooking and it flawlessly handles your meat, now that's a phrase I've never typed before. LOL
customer_reviews.author: RAD Man

customer_reviews.title: Great product and next-level customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device, quality build, and simple to operate. An added bonus is that the customer service from Gramercy Kitchen is absolutely top-notch. Seriously, I can't recall a more helpful seller in all of my Amazon experience.
customer_reviews.author: MauiShadow

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Temperature!
customer_reviews.text: Took it out the box and tested it. It doesn't hold temperature and just constantly climbs. It also gives of a strong plastic scent. It's quiet and circulates the water. That doesn't help me if it can't maintain a given temp. Update: The company contacted me and gave me a refund and offered to replace the unit. The unit may have been broken but the customer service is quick and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Munsanto

customer_reviews.title: Temperature rises uncontrollably
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when it worked. However, after only a few months of use (1-2 times a week), the temperature does not stop rising regardless of my settings. Though I enjoyed it at first, I'm very disappointed that it didn't last. ** Update: I had sent an email to Gramercy's Customer service channel on the evening I discovered the malfunction. By the following morning, I had a response in my inbox and a replacement unit on the way. Gramercy Kitchen Co's customer service experience was commendable. I just don't have the time to deal with complicated warranty service, thank you for being anything but!
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Machine, slightly fragile base design - 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The machine does exactly what it says it does. In a market crowded with alternatives that all have unneeded or useless gimmicks (bluetooth), this machine boils water. It is fantastic. The one drawback is the the position of the fan and the plastic covering at the bottom. It is held in place by a few very small pieces of plastic, and if one breaks the covering falls off, exposing the fan that circulates the water. Not entirely the fault of the device if used perfectly, and if they sold replacements I would be super happy and okay with needing to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Sevice!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star customer service! Once I realized product was defective and contacted Gramercy Kitchen, I had a new unit within 5 days. I haven't cooked anything yet but in the "test run," I love the simplicity of setting temp & time and look forward to sous vide-ing!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: This sous vide is really easy to use, but what I love most is the customer service. When I, had an issue with the steam making the device not work consistently, they sent me a new one, even though I was a few months post warranty! I'm really glad as the sous vide has changed my life when it comes to cooking meat.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Sous Vide is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time adventurous cook and know my way around the kitchen. Not sure why it took so long for me to adopt sous vide but it has changed the way I approach cooking. I've never made such tender, beef, chicken, fish and scallops. The GK unit is super easy to use. I had an intermittent problem with mine after a few months and after a few diagnostic questions, the helpful folks in customer service replaced the unit without any cost or hassle. I'd recommend this to anyone interested in trying sous vide.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING... Perfection in the Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I've never imagined technology and culinary would be a great combo... it's here, The Sous Vide Immersion unit. Just received the unit recently and have used it only twice but the results were great. First thing I tried was the hard boiled eggs and they were perfect, soft yolk and non-rubber whites. I also used it to cooked two ribeye steaks and to my surprise, they were done just right at 130 degrees for medium rare. Now I can't wait to try it with other dishes. The unit has a great feel and cleaning was a breeze, it's accurate and quiet. It far exceeded my expectation. A must have in today's busy schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: The directions were simple. The controls: temperature and time, were easy to master. The heating unit can be rotated easily. It's a snap to clean. I was pleasantly surprised at how quiet it runs and how quickly it brings the water up to temp. There are many great resources from Gramercy which help to make sense of this new way of cooking. As a bonus, I feel fancy telling my friends about SV. I really appreciate the reasonable price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chad M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I will never cook a roast any other way!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid hunter and wanted to try a sous vided elk roast. There are no bones, and absolutely no fat on the roasts. Traditional cooking measures yielded a dry, tasteless product. I received my Gramercy Sous Vide this morning and had the roast on the table tonight! I cooked it for 7 hours, at 133 degrees. Absolutely unbelievable taste, tender, juicy texture and perfectly meduim rare! The best meat we’ve ever eaten!
customer_reviews.author: Paula R.

customer_reviews.title: Always start with good food . This will not make gourmet food from poor quality cuts.
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased. Good looking, easy to use controls with excellent easy to read and understand control panel. Am still experimenting but have had the best tasting chicken ever . I have to realize that you cannot, no matter how you try, make a silk purse from a sows ear. Start with good food and use the appropriate temp and times for the cuts you have. Think we will be using it a lot. I still watch it but the freedom from constant supervision of the cooking is liberating. My wife has recommended this unit to two of her best friends.
customer_reviews.author: cedric craig

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Cook!
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook but have not been into technology in the kitchen until now! The Gramercy Kitchen Sous Vide Immersion Cooker has very easy to understand step by step instructions that make cooking my favorite meats, fish, vegetables and even eggs a breeze and lots of fun! And unlike other brands, this product comes with an attractive storage sleeve that helps to protect the cooker and keep things neat and clean in the kitchen. What a great product! Lets have some more Gramercy Kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C Tubb

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: Turned it on for the first time, there was somekind of explosion and smoke came out. Continued to work but the machine was beeping away and the thermometer was way off going up and down like a seasaw. Edit. To be fair, the company contacted me immediately and wanted to send me another machine. But when they found out that I used a converter [I live in a country that has 220v] they responded that their product does not work with a converter. ANYONE LIVING IN A COUNTRY THATS DOESN'T USE 120V DON'T BUY ANY SOUS VIDE COOKER THAT'S NOT SUITABLE TO YOUR VOLTAGE.
customer_reviews.author: david@mm

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months the machine suddenly stopped circulating water and beeped constantly. I contacted customer service and they replaced it right away. It has been almost a year with heavy use and I have had absolutely ZERO problems with the unit. I mean i take it places and use it roughly 4-5 times a week sometimes overnight and it has worked better than any other brand out there! Gramercy Kitchen Co's sous vide is the way to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: Habershon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing product. I've been fascinated with chefs and fine dining and heard about this style of cooking from one of my favorite movies. When the Gramercy Kitchen Co product arrived I immediately noticed the beautiful packaging and upon opening it the quality of the product. It's easy to use and makes me feel like a true chef while making my food taste great. Do yourself a favor if you love to cook and grab one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L Johnson Jr

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have hear about Sous Vide and purchased this item based solely upon the reviews. Arrived fast, great communication from company along with helpful recipes. We made chicken breasts as our test run and they turned out perfect! Juicy, consistent through out ( not the over cooked on the thin part ) - absolutely delicious, easy and perfect. We were so impressed that we ordered another one for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: Venison
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve cooked a 5 ounce chunk of backstrap from an old white tail buck. I soaked it in water to which I added a little Worcester sauce and a little salt overnight in the fridge then cooked it at 135 degrees for two hours. Three minutes on the gas grill. It was super juicy and tender! If I didn’ know what it was I would have thought it was medium rare prime rib! Amazing!! Can’t wait to do more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the more fun purchases I've ever made for the kitchen. I couldn't be happier with the results so far. The best filet mignon, best lamb chops and best pork loin I've ever made. I'm looking forward to trying veggies next!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Heat and Swirl
customer_reviews.text: Used twice so far for about 45 hours (tough beef cuts) and unit performed perfectly. For me, its 'limited feature dashboard' is a major feature. I want temperature setting to be accurate and timer really is something I never use on a unit. Bluetooth and/or any other device connectivity has absolutely no added value for me. Heat and swirl - That is what I require.
customer_reviews.author: Z Ranger Chef

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite way to cook now it is supper easy to make a delicious meal. I have made salmon, chicken and of course steaks and all have exceeded expectations. Last night’s soy ginger Tri Tip was so juicy and tender that I might have to retire my BBQ. I have had this for about a month and cook with it 3 -4 times a week you can prep your meals ahead of time by using vacuum sealed bags where all you have to do is set the water temp and drop them in.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S

customer_reviews.title: great concept and  fantastic product -
customer_reviews.text: I was new to Sous vide in fall of 2018, purchases gramercy sous vide and couldn't be happier. There are tons of recipies on the internet, all you need to do is seal your food and drop it in the temp controlled water. Excellent flavor for all eats, wings, eggs, ribs, rack of lamb, steak, roast ....
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Worked 5x and then died
customer_reviews.text: Ok, here it goes. I purchased the immersion cooker in June 2019. I have used it maybe 5x. When it works, it works outstanding. The problem is it died two weeks ago and I have only used it 5x. Should be more reliable than that. I have emailed them with no reply yet. I'll keep you posted and their ability or willingness to remedy the issue will affect this review. Things happen and products fail and that's understandable but to fail with so minimal usage isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Tender Flavorful Meat & Poultry
customer_reviews.text: I received my Gramercy Kitchen Sous Vide on Friday and made lime chicken breasts and rosemary lamb chops on Sunday. For both meals, the meat was very tender and flavorful. For a Tuesday night dinner, all I had to do was remove the cooked lamb chops from the refrigerator and sear them in a cast iron skillet, then make a few side dishes. This delicious meal took very little effort and was a treat on a work night.
customer_reviews.author: DGS

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in my 12 quart Everie container
customer_reviews.text: I used this Gramercy Kitchen Co Sous Vide immersion on a cheap well marbled ribeye steak. I cooked it for 2 hours at 135 degrees and it was the most tender steak I’ve ever eaten. I used a 12 quart container with a neoprene sleeve and a lid for the container. Then I browned the steak with a torch and it turned out beautifully. Today I purchased a flank steak to Sous Vide. I can’t wait to see how it turns out.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Baby

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This sous vide circulator is very well made and looks totally premium. The box and packaging are first class. It was very easy to set up and program. It took 20 minutes to heat 1.5 gallons of cold tap water to 140°F. I compared the temperature with another gauge and it was spot on. I used it to cook two large top sirloin steaks and it performed flawlessly. Very pleased with this device. The included storage bag is a nice accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpa Tom

customer_reviews.title: Setting the Temperature Could Tire Out a Thumb
customer_reviews.text: 1. It takes "forever" to scroll the thumbwheel to set the temperature, although it does a good job of holding the temperature (once it gets there). 2. It takes "forever" to get the water up to temperature (175oF) 3. The unit is physically large
customer_reviews.author: Parsifal

customer_reviews.title: quiet, simple, works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used my sous vide twice, each with great results. The Gramercy unit is quiet (yay!) and simple to use. A comparative thermometer gave a temp ~2 degrees F lower than what I set my unit to; not sure which one is more correct, but 2F is not a big deal. The chicken I cooked came out so tender it could be cut with a fork. I'm looking forward to using it more often!
customer_reviews.author: jetsetpet

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great vendor!
customer_reviews.text: Nice circulator, hold temperature accurately, has a pleasing aesthetic. My first unit had an issue after the Amazon 30 day return period had expired, Gramercy took care of the problem immediately, and made getting my replacement unit very convenient. I like the product, and I like the vendor, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Temperature was off by a decent amount but works fine if I account for it.
customer_reviews.text: For a while all my dishes were coming out of the water undercooked. So I double checked the temperature on the unit against several thermometers, and it appears the unit was off by around a flat 10 degrees. So I just make sure I set the temperature on this unit 10 degrees higher than what I want, and everything comes out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Rhee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different brand and after it not working right, getting a replacement that still didn't work right I returned it and bought this. Couldn't be happier! I want to cook everything with this it's so easy. I have a Rubbermaid container and lid I got too and it all works together great! Next... cheesecake!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a re-review of the machine that i was extremely happy with when i first purchased it. I had some temperature accuracy issues. Company replaced it before I asked. Works as it is supposed to. This company is fantastic. They care and stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: NikonLee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service/ Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the Sous Vide Immersion Circulator Cooker omitting an odor that smelled like the plastic may have been too hot. Contacted Gramercy Kitchen Co. customer service and they immediately took care of me. They couldn't have been easier and more helpful to deal with. A rarity anymore. Oh yeah, I love my Immersion Cooker! I am a fairly incompetent cook but the immersion cooker makes me look qualified to serve a meal. For someone who actually knows how to cook, this is a lay-up. You will wow your family and guests.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Schneider

customer_reviews.title: customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product and performed well. After 6 months unable to program settings. Contacted customer service and told them of our problem. They immediately responded that they would send us a new cooker, without sending the old one back, and without additional charge. The new cooker arrived 2 days later and works well. The customer service exceeded our expectations in terms of time, replacement and over all handling of the situation. Thank you again to the Gramercy company.
customer_reviews.author: baw

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy machine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple design Sous Vide circulator. It is very large but heavy and well made. I like it because I don't to have work with an app or wireless connection. You just stick it in the pot, set temp +/- time, and good to go. I've used it twice and will update if anything goes wrong. Update: I’ve used it about 10 times now and no complaints. It is working very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arzhang Ashkan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Gramercy Sous Vide Cooker makes mealtime prep so much easier, especially when entertaining. We have used it for steaks, chicken, shrimp, vegetables. This cooker provides reliable and precise temperature control, it is easy to use, and it has performed flawlessly! I did not want to spend more $$$ for bluetooth features I don't want or need, so I chose this model. Good choice. I have found Gramercy to be helpful and responsive, so I would give both the product and the company 5 stars !!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy White

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use, temperature was accurate, design is overall good but could use some improvements with the internal design. cooking steaks with it is has always turned out perfect. I did have an issue with the unit not working at one pount due to an issue with my particular sous vide but had a replacement sent out shortly after contacting seller, they were quick to reply and very helpful. I hope to see a new design from the company soon i like the one i have currently but i think there is room for improvement with the internals and their tolerance to outside variables such as steam.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Cooking at its best.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and set up and the meat is tender and moist. Cleanup is easy and quick. Most anything can be done Sous Vide style of cooking. This is a quality piece of equipment from a company that follows through on their product. Worth every penny spent and would have spent more.
customer_reviews.author: imabel2

customer_reviews.title: My first experience w/sous vide has been excellent. With the GK SousVide cooker you cannot fail ...
customer_reviews.text: My first experience w/sous vide has been excellent. With the GK SousVide cooker you cannot fail to effortlessly prepare a perfect meal. I have made yogurt, cream cheese, ricotta as well as moist juicy chicken. The device is beautifully designed, well crafted and most importantly the customer service I have received from Alex has been swift and helpful. Coming in at a considerable less cost than others you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: ken nyc

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, a disappointment after minimal use---
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for some time, (1yr) but suddenly decided to shit out on me. I have used it a total of 10 times max. It will not stop beeping once the water reaches temp. As if the water is low. Nothing works to reset. Very disappointing when you have yoghurt ready to incubate and nowhere to incubate it :/
customer_reviews.author: Candice S.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps PERFECT temperature---JUST what we needed
customer_reviews.text: JUST what we needed to make our Lactobacillus Reuteri Raw Milk yogurt! Anyone who is "Undoctored" (Dr. Davis of Wheat Belly fame) will recognize that yogurts can be finicky. (Cook ONLY to 175, cool to 100 etc .etc.) Making your own with raw milk can be disastrous. Ours turned out PERFECT and now I can have my daily dose of Lactobacillus Reuteri Raw Milk yogurt very inexpensively and yummily! Can hardly wait to learn about cooking other things with this gadget! Katherine Nickerson, Reverse Mortgage Exclusive-ist
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit: How to Solve the Initial Noise Problem
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are a bit vague about what to do if the unit is noisy. No phone number anywhere to get immediate help. I finally determined the propeller was hitting one of the heating coils. By bending the long shaft of the prop, it moved the propeller away from the coil. After this modification it runs very quietly. Love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Only works for awhile.
customer_reviews.text: Used this cooker about once a week for 3 months or so and it stopped working. It just would beep an flash after an hour or so. I contacted the manufacturer and they promply replaced it. The new one worked great for about 3 months. Now I have the same problem. I'm not interested in getting another 3 month replacement, I'm buying another brand. I would not suggest you buy this product if you intend to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: kjhennig

customer_reviews.title: Time saving, high quality Sous Vide!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality sous vide. We have used it a few times per week since I bought it. I was originally shown this method of cooking by my father who has a higher priced wi-fi bluetooth enabled device. He likes my Gramercy Kitchen just as well. I'm very happy with the quality and sturdiness of this unit and pretty sure we will be investing in another one just like it soon. Sous vide=more time at the lake and less time in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and so easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an absolute rookie with sous vide. Tried it yesterday to sous vide chicken breasts and then smoked them in my smoker - absolutely great. As they were smoking, I used the sous vide to do fresh asparagus in butter and rosemary - wonderful. I will do much much more with this machine. It is set it and forget it - just like my pellet smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Neil P Buterbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance
customer_reviews.text: We have made two meal using this and have been very pleased. Using information on their blog we have had wonderful steaks as well as a pot roast that would have passed for prime rib. Delicious, and I suspect I'll see my college student more often now.
customer_reviews.author: MomWilde

customer_reviews.title: they work very hard to make sure your purchase is to excellent satisfaction. Sous Vide works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This is a stand up company, they work very hard to make sure your purchase is to excellent satisfaction. Sous Vide works wonderfully. No need for WiFi, Facebook to cook your food. If you haven't tried the Sous Vide method of cooking your missing out on fantastic, perfectly cooked food. Seriously the best steak I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to set up and use as advertised.  Great cooking results.
customer_reviews.text: I am most pleased with this purchase. The Sous Vide is as simple and easy to use as described, and the meal results so far are fantastic. Tender steaks cooked to perfection! Pulled pork from shoulder roast outstanding. I will definitely go with Amazon's choice for other purchases and won't hesitate to buy again from Gramercy. Customer service is also great -- I got a response within hours on questions over a week-end.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Monroe

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. I've made egg white bites with red peppers and boneless chicken thighs. Both were delicious ! chicken was crisped on the skin side for a restaurant quality meal. I'm looking forward to learning more and have already recommended this cooker to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: McMaggie

customer_reviews.title: Temperature readings are wildly off after just a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: The company has great customer service. I had a defective unit that was promptly replaced along with helpful links to resources. The replacement unit appears to be an updated model. It runs flawlessly and even came with a handy clip to hold the machine in place. Made delicious sous vide egg bites.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: the performance so far has been great. I WILL update this evaluation in a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, but I am impressed. Simple to use and spot on with holding temperature. The steaks cooked came out exactly right. While I still have questions about it (such as the water capacity it can handle), the performance so far has been great. I WILL update this evaluation in a few weeks when I have more trials.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Nom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor product. The temperature is inaccurate. The machine stops and sounds an alarm randomly for no reason. I have been cooking sous vide in a professional kitchen for a decade, using mostly Polyscience equipment. I wanted something for the home and wanted to see how the technology has progressed. Never have I had issues like this. I would recommend spending a little bit more money and saving a lot of headache
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: We actually received a faulty unit at first. It appeared to work well out of the box but the temperature regulation mechanism didn't work, so it would reach the target temperature but then keep heating the water until near boiling. So I would definitely recommend testing the unit once or twice to avoid ruining an expensive cut of meat. Having said that, Gramercy's customer service were great. They were quick to respond and easy to communicate with and sent us a replacement unit which seems to work great. Any product can have an occasional dud, and since this was handled painlessly I definitely recommend the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hilde

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good company
customer_reviews.text: This sous vide cooker is easy to use and gets the job done. I had an issue with mine after a year of use that the company addressed with great grace and alacrity. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BarnEyes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This sous vide does not have Wi-Fi or Bluetooth, but I didn't need that. I just wanted a sous vide that cooks a great steak, salmon, pork, all at a very competitive price. And this product more than met my expectations. I even enjoyed making pickles! The storage bag is a great addition. And the folks at Gramercy were very helpful with some questions I had. They were very quick to reply, and helpful in addressing my questions to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: No instructions on how to Sous Vide food
customer_reviews.text: Instructions on only how to operate controls on device. Website is only for shopping. No resource on how to successfully Sous Vide food. Cooking with it is a shot in the dark. Returned it for another brand
customer_reviews.author: carol Haugaard

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I finally wanted to try Sous Vide cooking. Did some research and the Gramercy Kitchen Sous Vide Immersion Circulator Cooker was the best bang for the buck. After a short learning curve and watching some YouTube videos, (Sous Vide Everything), the steaks and anything else I cook come out perfect every time. I am very happy with my purchase! Any problems and they will replace the unit fast!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Norman

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Anova
customer_reviews.text: I had the Anova (a gift) until it fried when I stupidly tried to use it internationally. I’ve loved sous vide cooking so much that I immediately found this one and ended up going with it just because of affordability. The Anova is definitely higher quality, but in the end they both do just as good a job of cooking meat to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best homemade steaks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday. Best homemade steak ever! Super easy to use, simple to clean then stores away nicely in a sweet black drawstring bag.
customer_reviews.author: Be W

customer_reviews.title: ... because it does not require an app to work like the other top rated machine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this machine over the others on Amazon because it does not require an app to work like the other top rated machine. The package arrived on time and intact. It is a Christmas gift for my wife so I will update once she puts it to use.
customer_reviews.author: TFernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Can't calibrate the temperature of the unit accurately. Adjusted all of the way to the low range, the unit is still off by 2+ degrees. >>> Seller volunteered to replace the unit. Best customer service ever! Purchasing more units as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: Getting to know my new Sous Vide
customer_reviews.text: The NY Strips came out perfect. Delicious. Vegetables turned out great. I tried a whole 4 lb chicken for 6 hours and was not done..Went by instructions.Will experiment on chicken.. maybe if I had split the chicken would have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: great product support
customer_reviews.text: the first two times my wife used the sous vide, the temperature went wildly out of control - it went past the set time and just kept going up. Frustrated I looked at other reviews. When I saw other comments on the great support I decided to contact them. Instant service - quick response to email, and new sous vide in 2 days! The new one works as expected. We're happy. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our restaurant. This thing is a workhorse. We bought a Gourmia immersion circulator and it broke right away. Then we got this one, more reasonably priced in case we had the same bad luck. Easy to use and clean. We would liked it so much we just bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: julie przybylski

customer_reviews.title: First one DOA second seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: First one was dead second seems to work so far haven't actually cooked anything yet
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's a learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Not as simple as you might think. Lack of a usable cook book makes it a little of a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Melvyn Drexler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product...Fantastic Company
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these based on the reviews on Amazon. Well I couldn't be happier. The company sent me emails before I even got the product to provide me with tips and recipes, and to make sure I was happy. I used the Sous Vide machine a few times and liked it so much I bought the same one and sent to my son. Simple, well built and fantastic company and customer service. Why buy any other circulator?
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas O

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy. Simple, reliable, pefect results.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, and works perfectly. You might need to experiment to find the perfect temperature, depending on how you like your meat cooked. Cheap Price too!
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Hauer

customer_reviews.title: Tender
customer_reviews.text: I like this cooker. I use it often. It still confuses me how I can cook a piece of meat for 8 hours and it can remain medium rare??? I've gotten compliments for serving such tender steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fast and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This sous vide is great. It defrosts my child’s milk to body temperature, very quickly. I do it because I don’t want to overheat the milk. It is quiet. When we had an issue, customer service was very responsive and solved the issue immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Y Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Touch buttons are horrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible touch buttons that are completely non responsive at times, so annoying and easy to avoid
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Machio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and Great customer service - Works as advertised. Had an issue with the temp setting and cust service responded within an hour - sending a replacement out. Nice all around Package. I like the simplicity of the unit and my steaks are tasting just right. Just learning this Sous Vide cooking method so this is a great starter unit. Would not hesitate to recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to program. Started to overheat after a month. Completely dead after 6 weeks. The company had wonderful, responsive customer service and sent me a new unit right away.
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: This thing made the best steak and chicken I’ve ever had. Super easy to use. Do yourself a favor and soak your meat for a tender mouthful every time.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Beans

product_meta.title: Sous Vide Immersion Circulator Cooker | UPGRADED - Only machine with DELAY-START Timer | Simplest to use & clean, set & go out of the box | BONUS Velvet Storage Sleeve & e-Recipe Book FREE
feature_bullets: OUR DEVICE IS SIMPLE: While other sous vide cookers require unstable Wifi or bluetooth connections to work fully, ours is easy - no fighting with the internet. Functions intuitively, right out of the box. NEW UPGRADE: Our device now includes a delay start timer. Set the timer in the morning, you get to go live your life and the cook cycle will start without you. Dinner will be ready on time without you having to babysit your meal!

WHY WE DO WHAT WE DO: We love to cook. We use our products daily and we only use the best. We provide the exact same for our customers. Because of our commitment to quality, we offer a machine that will last. We built in a special shield that keeps steam from creeping into the electronics of your unit, damaging it. Your machine will last. Also, our cooker uses the perfect amount of power to quickly heat your water bath. No using extra electricity as with others. Operates in near silence.

CUSTOMER CARE PROMISE: Gramercy Kitchen Co. strives to create complete customer satisfaction, period. Our customers mean more to us than our sales. If you are unhappy with your sous vide pod for any reason, we will replace or refund your order. Zero questions asked. We also love to help out by recommending recipes, answering questions and being a help as you use our device to make the best imaginable food. So please don’t hesitate to reach out - we love to help!

HANDS FREE COOKING: Our sous vide stick shortens your active meal prep time. It takes 10 minutes to season, bag up or vacuum seal your food and prepare your sous vide container, lid, water balls and rack if you have them - your own at-home water oven. Then, let it run. No need to babysit the process, freeing up your time to relax. Then, get ready to serve the best steak, eggs, chicken you’ve had. Easy to clean! Just twist off the pump housing, use a little dish soap and lay flat to dry.

BONUSES! With your purchase you will get a velvet storage sleeve and a downloadable time and temperature guide to get you started on your culinary journey! Sous vide is as much an art form as a science, and our guide will help you understand all the important nuances of cooking up the exact dinner of your dreams. Additionally, we are building a growing library of some of the best sous vide recipes around - and you’ll get free online access with your purchase. Make sure to watch your inbox!
